venue.name: Myles Standish State Forest-- East Entrance

item.description:
East Entrance to Curlew Pond via the Northwest Passage. A one way hike. We're still working out the exact route. It will be around 6 or 7 miles in total. We will arrange a carpool from one end to the other.

Breakfast at 8:30 at Panera Bread, Shops at 5, (Exit 5 off Route 3), Plymouth

Good hiking shoes are essential. This area is somewhat hilly (for Myles Standish) and some of the trails are loose. Bring water and snacks.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Curlew Pond shuttle
